attributes.action: Rother Law - Uphold a victims human rights first & foremost.
attributes.background: In all criminal cases including rape, grooming & sexual assault the police & CPS Must uphold the human rights of all victims & their families first & foremost before all & any perpetrators' & that ALL perpetrators are punished to the fullest extent of law regardless of race or religion.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
